document_data.name: House Druu'giir
document_data.Headquarters: House Druu'giir occupied a rectangular-shaped compound southeast of the tip of the [[Westrift]]. The small compound was fenced by stalagmites.
document_data.Activities: House Druu'giir was one of the most powerful mercantile houses, second only to [[House Baenre]].
document_data.Leadership: The house was dominated by elderly male [[wizard]]s.
